trans-unit.source: Provides a control for viewing flow content in a continuous scrolling mode.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um controle para visualizar o conteúdo de fluxo em um modo de rolagem contínuo.

trans-unit.source: FlowDocumentScrollViewer shows content in continuous scrolling mode.
trans-unit.target: FlowDocumentScrollViewer mostra o conteúdo no modo de rolagem contínua.

trans-unit.source: A similar control, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>, shows content in page-at-a-time viewing mode.
trans-unit.target: Um controle semelhante, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>, mostra o conteúdo no modo de exibição de uma página por vez.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>

trans-unit.source: Both <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> and FlowDocumentScrollViewer are fixed to a particular viewing mode.
trans-unit.target: Ambos <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>e FlowDocumentScrollViewer são fixos em um modo de visualização particular.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>

trans-unit.source: On the other hand, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader> includes features that enable the user to dynamically choose between various viewing modes (as provided by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReaderViewingMode> enumeration), at the cost of being heavier weight than <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> or FlowDocumentScrollViewer.
trans-unit.target: Por outro lado, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader>inclui recursos que permitem ao usuário escolher dinamicamente entre diversos modos de visualização (conforme fornecido pelo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReaderViewingMode>enumeração), às custas de sendo pesado que <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>ou FlowDocumentScrollViewer.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReaderViewingMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader>

trans-unit.source: The following figure shows a FlowDocumentScrollViewer control with its default [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: A figura a seguir mostra um controle FlowDocumentReader com seu padrão [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: ![Screenshot: Basic FlowDocumentScrollViewer](~/add/media/flowdocscrollviewer-main.png "Screenshot: Basic FlowDocumentScrollViewer") By default, a vertical scrollbar is always shown, and a horizontal scrollbar becomes visible if needed.
trans-unit.target: ![Captura de tela: FlowDocumentScrollViewer básico](~/add/media/flowdocscrollviewer-main.png "captura de tela: FlowDocumentScrollViewer básico") por padrão, uma barra de rolagem vertical está sempre sendo exibida, e uma barra de rolagem horizontal se torna visível, se necessário.

trans-unit.source: The default [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] for FlowDocumentScrollViewer does not include a toolbar; however, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.IsToolBarVisible%2A> property can be used to enable a built-in toolbar.
trans-unit.target: O padrão [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] para FlowDocumentScrollViewer não inclui uma barra de ferramentas; no entanto, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.IsToolBarVisible%2A>propriedade pode ser usada para habilitar a barra de ferramentas interna.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.IsToolBarVisible%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument> is the only allowable child element for a FlowDocumentScrollViewer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>é o elemento filho permitido apenas para um FlowDocumentScrollViewer.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>

trans-unit.source: A FlowDocumentScrollViewer element may host no more than one <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>.
trans-unit.target: Um elemento FlowDocumentScrollViewer pode hospedar não mais de um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Cancels any current printing job.
trans-unit.target: Cancela qualquer trabalho de impressão atual.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom*> level can be decreased.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom*>nível pode ser diminuído.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom*>

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.DecreaseZoom%2A> method decreases the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom%2A> level by the amount specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.DecreaseZoom%2A>método diminui o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom%2A>nível com o valor especificado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.DecreaseZoom%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is subject to the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.MinZoom%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O valor dessa propriedade está sujeito ao valor de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.MinZoom%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.MinZoom%2A>

trans-unit.target: Chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.IncreaseZoom%2A>método aumenta o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom%2A>nível com o valor especificado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.IncreaseZoom%2A>

trans-unit.target: O valor dessa propriedade está sujeito ao valor de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.MaxZoom%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.MaxZoom%2A>

trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Executes the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.DecreaseZoom*> routed command.
trans-unit.target: Executa o <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.DecreaseZoom*>comando roteado.</xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.DecreaseZoom*>

trans-unit.source: The DecreaseZoom method decreases the current <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom%2A> level by the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O método DecreaseZoom diminui atual <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom%2A>nível pelo valor especificado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom%2A>

trans-unit.source: Calling this method has no effect if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.CanDecreaseZoom%2A> property returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Chamar esse método não tem efeito se a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.CanDecreaseZoom%2A>propriedade retorna `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.CanDecreaseZoom%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument"></xref> that hosts the content to be displayed by the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument"> </xref> que hospeda o conteúdo a ser exibido, o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument"></xref> that hosts the content to be displayed by the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument"> </xref> que hospeda o conteúdo a ser exibido, o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Document*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Document*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Document*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Toggles the **Find** dialog.
trans-unit.target: Alterna o **localizar** caixa de diálogo.

trans-unit.source: By default, Ctrl+F provides a keyboard shortcut for toggling the **Find** dialog.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, Ctrl + F fornece um atalho de teclado para alternar o **localizar** caixa de diálogo.

trans-unit.source: The following figure shows the **Find** dialog on a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer> with default UI.
trans-unit.target: A figura a seguir mostra o **localizar** caixa de diálogo em um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>padrão da interface do usuário.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: ![Screenshot: FlowDocumentScrollViewer find dialog](~/add/media/flowdocscrollviewer-find.png "Screenshot: FlowDocumentScrollViewer find dialog") The default **Find** dialog includes a field for entering search text, as well as buttons for **Find Next**, **Find Previous**, and **Options**.
trans-unit.target: ![Captura de tela: FlowDocumentScrollViewer localizar a caixa de diálogo](~/add/media/flowdocscrollviewer-find.png "captura de tela: FlowDocumentScrollViewer localizar a caixa de diálogo") padrão **localizar** caixa de diálogo inclui um campo para inserir o texto de pesquisa, bem como botões para **Localizar próximo**, **Localizar anterior**, e **opções**.

trans-unit.source: The following **Find** options are provided by default: - Match whole word only - Match case - Match diacritic - Match kashida - Match alef hamza
trans-unit.target: O seguinte **localizar** opções são fornecidas por padrão: - coincidir palavra inteira - correspondência caso - Match diacrítico - kashida correspondência - correspondência alef-hamza

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a horizontal scroll bar is shown.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se uma barra de rolagem horizontal é exibida.

trans-unit.target: O método IncreaseZoom aumenta atual <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom%2A>nível pelo valor especificado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom%2A>

trans-unit.target: Chamar esse método não tem efeito se a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.CanIncreaseZoom%2A>propriedade</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.CanIncreaseZoom%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref> displays selected text when the control does not have focus.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"> </xref> exibe o texto selecionado quando o controle não tem foco.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência | | | |-|-| | Campo de identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref> displays selected text when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref> does not have focus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"> </xref> exibe o texto selecionado quando o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"> </xref> não tem o foco; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão registrado é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o que pode influenciar o valor, consulte [precedência de valor de propriedade de dependência](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The maximum allowable <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom*> level for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref>, interpreted as a percentage.

trans-unit.source: Called when a printing job has completed.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando um trabalho de impressão for concluída.

trans-unit.source: Invokes a standard **Print** dialog which can be used to print the contents of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref> and configure printing preferences.
trans-unit.target: Invoca um padrão **imprimir** caixa de diálogo que pode ser usada para imprimir o conteúdo do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"> </xref> e configurar as preferências de impressão.

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] does not provide a **Print** button.
trans-unit.target: O padrão <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] não fornece um **impressão** botão.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: The following figure shows an example of a standard **Print** dialog.
trans-unit.target: A figura a seguir mostra um exemplo de um padrão **impressão** caixa de diálogo.

trans-unit.source: Note that the specific appearance of the **Print** dialog may vary depending on the hosting computer's configuration.
trans-unit.target: Observe que a aparência específica do **impressão** caixa de diálogo pode variar dependendo da configuração do computador host.

trans-unit.source: ![Screenshot: Print dialog box](~/add/media/flowdocrdr-print.png "Screenshot: Print dialog box")
trans-unit.target: ![Captura de tela: Caixa de diálogo de impressão](~/add/media/flowdocrdr-print.png "captura de tela: caixa de diálogo Imprimir")

trans-unit.source: Gets the selected content of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o conteúdo selecionado do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Selection is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: Seleção é introduzida no .NET Framework versão 3.5.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [versões e dependências](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The selected content of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O conteúdo selecionado do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the brush that highlights the selected text.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o pincel que destaca o texto selecionado.

trans-unit.source: You can specify the brush that highlights selected text in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer> by setting the SelectionBrush and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionOpacity%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Você pode especificar o pincel que destaca o texto selecionado em um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>Definindo o CaretBrush e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionOpacity%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionOpacity%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: A brush that highlights the selected text.
trans-unit.target: Um pincel que destaca o texto selecionado.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionBrush*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionBrush*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionBrush*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the opacity of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionBrush*>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a opacidade de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionBrush*>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionBrush*>

trans-unit.source: If you set the SelectionOpacity to 0, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionBrush%2A> is transparent and is not visible.
trans-unit.target: Se você definir o SelectionOpacity como 0, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionBrush%2A>é transparente e não fica visível.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionBrush%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set the SelectionOpacity to 1.0, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionBrush%2A> is opaque and the selected text is not visible.
trans-unit.target: Se você definir o SelectionOpacity 1.0, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionBrush%2A>é opaco e selecionado texto não estiver visível.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionBrush%2A>

trans-unit.source: The opacity of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionBrush*>.
trans-unit.target: A opacidade de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionBrush*>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionBrush*>

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.4.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é 0,4.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionOpacity*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionOpacity*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionOpacity*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.target: Um objeto que especifica o tipo de objeto de serviço a ser obtido.

trans-unit.source: A service object of type serviceType, or if there is no service object of type serviceType.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto de serviço do tipo serviceType , ou se não houver nenhum objeto de serviço do tipo serviceType .

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Document*> property to add a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument"></xref> as the content child for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Document*>propriedade para adicionar um <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument"> </xref> como o conteúdo filho para o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Document*>

trans-unit.source: An object to add as a child.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto a ser adicionado como um filho.

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

trans-unit.source: A string to add to the object.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres para adicionar ao objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a vertical scroll bar is shown.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se uma barra de rolagem vertical é exibida.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência | | | |-|-| | Campo de identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`||

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollBarVisibility"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollBarVisibility"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollBarVisibility"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollBarVisibility"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.VerticalScrollBarVisibility*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.VerticalScrollBarVisibility*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.VerticalScrollBarVisibility*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current zoom level.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nível de zoom atual.

trans-unit.source: The zoom level is constrained by the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.MinZoom%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.MaxZoom%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: O nível de zoom é restrito pelos valores de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.MinZoom%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.MaxZoom%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.MaxZoom%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.MinZoom%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência | | | |-|-| | Campo de identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: The current zoom level, interpreted as a percentage.
trans-unit.target: O nível de zoom atual é interpretado como uma porcentagem.

trans-unit.source: The default is 100.0 (a zoom level of 100%).
trans-unit.target: O padrão é 100.0 (um nível de zoom de 100%).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the zoom increment.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o incremento de zoom.

trans-unit.source: The zoom increment is the percentage by which the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom%2A> level is increased or decreased when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.IncreaseZoom%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.DecreaseZoom%2A> commands are executed, respectively.
trans-unit.target: O incremento de zoom é a porcentagem pela qual o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom%2A>nível aumenta ou diminui quando a <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.IncreaseZoom%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.DecreaseZoom%2A>comandos são executados, respectivamente.</xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.DecreaseZoom%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.IncreaseZoom%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência | | | |-|-| | Campo de identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: The current zoom increment, interpreted as a percentage.
trans-unit.target: O incremento de zoom atual, interpretado como uma porcentagem.

trans-unit.source: The default is 10.0 (zoom increments by 10%).
trans-unit.target: O padrão é 10.0 (zoom aumenta em incrementos de 10%).

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.ZoomIncrement*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.ZoomIncrement*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.ZoomIncrement*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.
